title: Too Much Ice (feat. Quavo)
lyrics:
Chyeah, ayy, ayy, brr, chyeah, Lil Pump, chyeah, chyeah
Huncho, Huncho, Huncho, Huncho, woah
Ooh
Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me, bitch
I'm the youngest flexer out here, sure you've heard 'bout me

Bentley coupe, drop top coupe, cost a couple G's (Huh)

Ayy, I get high every day of the fuckin' week (Oh, shit)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me, bitch (Damn)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me (Ooh)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me (Chyeah, chyeah)

I'm the youngest flexer out here, know you've heard 'bout me



Too much ice on me, spent 800 bands just last week (Damn!)

Drink a pint of Wokhardt when I wanna sleep (Ooh)

Thick booty bitch, all she wanna do is eat (Chyeah)

Went to my jeweler told a nigga I want everything

Diamond chain, pinky ring, fucked the ho, she acting lame, ayy

Chain looking like it named glacier

Spell Lil Pump like a nigga with the mayor

Bust a nut in your bitch, leave it in here

Yeah, I flex hard like a nigga don't care

Louis'd down, bust down, yeah, I'm really up now

If he act stupid, tell the bitch, "Get the fuck out"

Racks on racks, yeah, hangin' out my jeans

Spend 20k the other day on some lean

Pull up in a 18-wheeler off a bean

Two bust downs, yeah, I feel like Charlie Sheen

Every time you see me, ooh, I be dripping, Fiji, chyeah

You see me on TV, ooh, and they wanna be me, ayy

Gucci robe on when I wake up, chyeah, chyeah, chyeah

Four gram bloods, I just faced him (Ooh, chyeah, ooh)



Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me, bitch

I'm the youngest flexer out here, sure you've heard 'bout me

Bentley coupe, drop top coupe, cost a couple G's (Huh)

Ayy, I get high every day of the fuckin' week (Oh, shit)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me, bitch (Damn)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me (Ooh)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me (Chyeah, chyeah)

Quavo, Quavo, Quavo, Quavo

I'm the youngest flexer out here, know you've heard 'bout me



Look at the ice on me, drippin' (Ice)

Pocket look like I do fitness

Put that lil' bitch on the Molly

She wanna show me her titties

McLaren, the Benz, the Bentleys (Skrrt)

I bought it to fuck up the engine (Skrrt)

Trap it, wrap it up, send it (Wrap it up)

Uncle still smokin' on midget (Ooh)

Tumble them, tumble them bags (Ooh)

Make more money than your dad (Chyeah)

Make more money than your dad (Ooh)

Pass it on ya like Steve Nash (Pass)

Rick keep spendin' like Taz (Spendin')

Pop two Percs, then spazz (Percy)

Jump off the stage with the cash

Robbin' the bank, no mask (Uhh)



Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me, bitch

I'm the youngest flexer out here, sure you've heard 'bout me

Bentley coupe, drop top coupe, cost a couple G's (Huh)

Ayy, I get high every day of the fuckin' week (Oh, shit)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me, bitch (Damn)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me (Ooh)

Too much ice, too much ice, too much ice on me (Chyeah, chyeah)

I'm the youngest flexer out here, know you've heard 'bout me
